headline: Shell and Exxon Scrap Viaro Sale of Strategic Bacton North Sea Gas Assets
summary: Regulatory review stalled the planned sale of Bacton and 11 offshore facilities, prompting Shell and Exxon to mutually end the deal.

headline: BP Reveals $5 Billion Write-Off in Green Energy, Points to ‘Weak’ Oil Trading
summary: The company had been a leader among the oil majors in shifting business away from fossil fuels and toward renewables.

headline: EQNR Secures New Production Licenses in Predefined Areas of the NCS
summary: Equinor ASA wins 35 new production licenses across the NCS for acreage in North Sea, Norwegian Sea and Barents to expand oil & gas exploration and production.

headline: Shell scraps £500m North Sea sale to alleged fraudster
summary: Shell has abandoned the £500m sale of almost a dozen gas fields in the North Sea to an oil trader accused of fraud.

raw.headline: Shell scraps £500m North Sea sale to alleged fraudster

headline: FCG: A Look At The Structure And Suitability Of This Energy Equity Index ETF
summary: FCG is best suited for investors with limited energy exposure who hold a bullish thesis on natural gas fundamentals relative to crude oil.

headline: Venezuelan Oil and the Limits of U.S. Refining Capacity
summary: Venezuelan crude is attractive to complex U.S. refiners with coking capacity, but only a subset of Gulf and East Coast plants can fully process the heavy, high-sulfur oil.

raw.headline: Venezuelan Oil and the Limits of U.S. Refining Capacity
raw.summary: Venezuelan crude is attractive to complex U.S. refiners with coking capacity, but only a subset of Gulf and East Coast plants can fully process the heavy, high-sulfur oil.

headline: Trump’s Venezuela Takeover Will Make Guyana Oil Safer
summary: With Venezuela sidelined and U.S. backing effectively deterring any aggression, geopolitical risk around Essequibo has faded
